typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_expense_rec as string,
		id_user as string,
		record_date as string,
		id_project as string,
		id_code_expense as string,
		amount as integer,
		comment as string,
		commit_state as integer,
		id_code_currency as string,
		id_code_expense_source as string,
		id_domain as string,
		read_only_comment as string,
		flags as string,
		id_picture as string,
		reserved1 as string,
		reserved2 as string,
		creator as string,
		create_timestamp as integer,
		modifier as string,
		modify_timestamp as integer,
		mileage as integer,
		id_assignment as string,
		load_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
